description: The father of Chane Laforet and one of the first to gain immortality on the Advena Avis, he is currently imprisoned by a government organisation in Newfoundland. He has an avid following who go to great lengths to free him, including taking an entire train hostage in exchange for their leader`s freedom. Huey does not agree with their methods and is aware that some of his followers only wish for the secret of his immortality.
name: Huey Laforet
